Info: Optionally use V16 N91E to monitor the current shaft (.01 deg) and trunnion (.001 deg) angle in R1 and R2.

Text: Place optics at 10 degree trunnion angle
Monitor for landmark. When Identified start 0.3 deg/sec pitch down
Make five marks spaced 25 seconds apart
Pitch up to ORDEAL R=0, P=5, Y=0
Initiate orbital pitch rate for next landmark
